main event: On 6 March 1953, an object about the size of a basketball was observed circling over Pasadena, Texas.
interesting points: The object was observed for approximately 50 minutes,The object was described as circling in motion,The object was confirmed to be unidentified after the observation,The report mentions varied sources for the observation,Two different observation periods were noted on separate occasions in Pasadena, Texas.
sighted object: an unidentified object about the size of a basketball
witness description: N/A, the report does not specify any confirmed witnesses.
